statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_information
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM healthcare_information ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT * FROM healthcare_information WHERE access_level='doctor'
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM healthcare_information WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM healthcare_information WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM healthcare_information WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_information WHERE access_level = 'nurse' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM healthcare_information WHERE access_level = 'admin' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_information WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1970-01-01' AND '1990-01-01' AND access_level = 'doctor' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medical_history FROM healthcare_information WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%' AND access_level = 'doctor';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_gender DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE patient_diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT doctor_name, medication, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='F' AND patient_diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(record_id) AS num_records FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_id HAVING num_records > 3;
SELECT MAX(record_date), doctor_name FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY doctor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, ssn FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE dob < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, dob, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Female' AND diagnosis IN ('Flu', 'Cold') ORDER BY dob ASC;
SELECT username, role FROM AccessControl WHERE access_level > 3 AND role = 'Doctor';
SELECT patient_name, gender, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Other' AND dob BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Physicians;
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM Physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM Physicians WHERE physician_id = 1;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL AND treatment_plan IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM Physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Physicians.physician_name, MedicalRecords.record_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id INNER JOIN Physicians ON MedicalRecords.physician_id = Physicians.physician_id ORDER BY MedicalRecords.record_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT * FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE hospital = 'General Hospital'
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT prescription_id, medication, dosage FROM prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_id DESC;
